description:
bufio.Scanner: delete obsolete TODO
Also fix the examples to use stderr for errors.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

On Thu, Mar 21, 2013 at 2:35 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> Description:
> bufio.Scanner: delete obsolete TODO
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/7716052/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7716052/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/pkg/bufio/scan.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/bufio/scan.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/bufio/scan.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/bufio/scan.go
> @@ -27,8 +27,6 @@
>  // control over error handling or large tokens, or must run sequential
> scans
>  // on a reader, should use bufio.Reader instead.
>  //
> -// TODO(r): Provide executable examples.
> -//
>  type Scanner struct {
>         r            io.Reader // The reader provided by the client.
>         split        SplitFunc // The function to split the tokens.
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a78557354dc0 ***

bufio.Scanner: delete obsolete TODO
Also fix the examples to use stderr for errors.
